title: Blood log
description: Lab results from a Complete Blood Count exam or similar.

person_id.description: the person to whom the blood results correspond

domain.description: the five dimensions of well - being(social, physical, intellectual, financial, spiritual)

blood_group.description: A+, A-, B+, B-, O+, O-, AB+, AB-

hct_%.description: Hematocrit - percentage of white cell volume to red cell volume

mcv_fl.description: mean corpuscular volume - average volume of a red blood cell in femtoliters (fL)

mch_pg.description: mean corpuscular hemoglobin - the average amount of hemoglobin in the average red cell in picograms(pg)

mchc_g_dl.description: mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration - the average concentration of hemoglobin in a given volume of red cells

mpv_fL.description: mean platelet volume - measures the average amount (volume) of platelets in femtoliters (fL)

rdw_cv_%.description: Red cell distribution width (coefficient of variation) - measures the variability of a red cell size and shape as percentage

neutrophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

neutrophils_cells_mcl.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in cells/mcL.

eosinophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

eosinophils_cells_mcl.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in cells/mcL.

basophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

basophils_cells_mcl.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in cells/mcL.

lymphocytes_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

lymphocytes_cells_mcl.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in cells/mcL.

monocytes_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

monocytes_cells_mcl.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in cells/mcL.
